item.title: 瑞银称，大陆集团分拆后可能会有 50%的市值回归
item.description: 据瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）称，如果德国汽车零部件制造商大陆集团（Continental AG）将其陷入困境的汽车部门分拆出去，那么股东的现金回报可能会激增。【原文：If German car-parts maker Continental AG goes through with spinning off its struggling automotive division, cash returns to shareholders could soar, according to UBS Group AG.】

item.title: 捷克央行行长坚持 "更高更长久 "的政策
item.description: 捷克央行行长 Ales Michl 表示，捷克央行正在降低借贷成本，但决策者将继续保持高于过去 10 年的利率水平。【原文：The Czech central bank is in the process of lowering borrowing costs but policymakers will keep interest rates higher than what they used to be over the past 10 years, according to Governor Ales Michl.】

item.title: 安踏宣布回购 13 亿美元股票以巩固股价
item.description: 中国体育用品制造商安踏体育用品有限公司周二表示，将斥资最多100亿港元（12.8亿美元）回购多达10%的股份。【原文：Chinese sportswear maker ANTA Sports Products Ltd. said on Tuesday it will spend up to HK$10 billion ($1.28 billion) to repurchase as much as 10% of its shares.】

item.title: 碧桂园考虑进一步推迟偿还人民币债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，碧桂园控股有限公司告诉一些投资者，该公司正在考虑进一步延长部分人民币债券的支付期限，因为长期的销售低迷加剧了这家中国开发商的财务压力。【原文：Country Garden Holdings Co. told some investors that it is considering further extending payments on some of its yuan bonds, according to people familiar with the matter, as a prolonged sales slump adds to the Chinese developer’s financial stress.】

item.description: 随着日本金融监管机构对向投资者销售高风险资产进行严格审查，日本生命保险公司（Nippon Life Insurance Co.【原文：Nippon Life Insurance Co. is revising the fees it pays to banks and brokerages for selling its products, as Japan’s financial regulator scrutinizes sales of riskier assets to investors.】

item.title: 140 万美元的首次公开募股超购 400 倍，显示印度股票狂热
item.description: 印度一家仅有两家分店和八名员工的摩托车经销商计划首次公开发行股票，超额认购超过 400 倍，这表明印度的新股市场已经过热。【原文：A planned initial public offering by an Indian motorcycle dealership with just two outlets and eight employees has been oversubscribed by more than 400 times, demonstrating how overheated the nation’s new-share market has become.】

item.title: 关注美国通胀和英伟达业绩，欧洲股市上涨
item.description: 欧洲股市周二上涨，投资者在等待美国通胀数据和本周晚些时候英伟达公司的财报。【原文：European stocks rose on Tuesday as investors awaited US inflation data and Nvidia Corp. earnings later this week.】

item.title: 动量指标显示东南亚货币反弹面临风险
item.description: 东南亚货币对美元的强劲反弹可能会失去动力，因为投资者对美联储政策中枢即将出台的亢奋情绪正在消退，至少从一个密切关注的动量指标来看是这样。【原文：The blistering rally in Southeast Asian currencies versus the dollar may lose momentum as investor exuberance over a pending Federal Reserve policy pivot fades, at least according to one closely-watched gauge of momentum.】

item.title: 第二季度德国经济受投资拖累
item.description: 投资和消费支出拖累了德国第二季度的经济，使德国最终摆脱多年停滞的希望破灭。【原文：Investment and consumer spending weighed on Germany’s economy in the second quarter — dashing hopes that the country can finally leave behind years of stagnation.】

item.title: 印尼在非洲论坛召开前加强对 Mpox 的监控
item.description: 在下周与非洲国家在巴厘岛举行重要论坛之前，印度尼西亚正在加强对麻风腮病毒的监控。【原文：Indonesia is stepping up surveillance for Mpox ahead of a major forum with African nations in Bali next week.】

item.title: 外国人将成为 2022 年以来购买印尼股票最多的人
item.description: 随着资金撤离亚洲主要市场，全球资金正涌入印尼股市，这表明在美联储即将降息之前，资金可能会转向印尼股市。【原文：Global money is flooding into Indonesian equities as funds exit major Asian markets, indicating a probable rotation into the country’s stocks ahead of the Federal Reserve’s imminent interest rate cut.】

item.description: 澳大利亚最大的液化天然气出口商负责人表示，北半球冬季通常是需求高峰期，价格上涨表明市场仍处于微妙的平衡状态。【原文：The head of Australia’s largest liquefied natural gas exporter said that higher prices for the Northern Hemisphere winter, when demand typically peaks, indicate the market is still finely balanced.】

item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，活动管理平台 Events.com 即将与鲍勃-戴蒙德（Bob Diamond）和杰夫-图德（Jeff Tuder）领导的一家空白支票公司达成合并交易，预估企业价值近 4 亿美元。【原文：Event management platform Events.com is nearing a deal to merge with a blank-check firm led by Bob Diamond and Jeff Tuder at a pro forma enterprise value of nearly $400 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Naspers 预计将为南非电子商务带来 52 亿美元的增长
item.description: 非洲市值最大的公司 Naspers Ltd. 预计，到 2035 年，电子商务和其他数字平台将为南非经济注入 914 亿兰特（52 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Naspers Ltd., Africa’s largest company by market value, expects e-commerce and other digital platforms to inject 91.4 billion rand ($5.2 billion) into the South African economy by 2035.】

item.description: 华尔街开始对明年的原油前景感到忧虑，高盛集团和摩根士丹利下调了原油价格预期，因为全球供应量增加，包括欧佩克+可能增加供应量。【原文：Wall Street is beginning to sour on the outlook for crude next year, with Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Morgan Stanley lowering price forecasts as global supplies increase, including potentially from OPEC+.】

item.title: 中国四川出现高温热网，农作物生长受阻
item.description: 中国西南部四川省的气温超过 40 摄氏度（104 华氏度），给电网带来压力，并在农作物生长的重要阶段对其造成损害。【原文：Temperatures over 40C (104F) in China’s southwestern province of Sichuan are putting pressure on the electricity grid and damaging crops at an important stage of their growth.】

item.title: 紫金将错失锂产量目标并控制项目进度
item.description: 紫金矿业集团股份有限公司是中国最有价值的矿业公司，也是一家有抱负的锂业巨头，该公司表示，由于价格持续低迷，今年的电池材料产量将无法达到预期目标。【原文：Zijin Mining Group Co., China’s most valuable miner and an aspiring lithium giant, said it will miss its production guidance for the battery material this year as prices continue to languish.】

item.description: 熟悉加拿大零售商想法的人士称，Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.可能会发行债务，并向其养老金股东寻求资金，以便为收购 7-Eleven 所有者 Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. could issue debt and tap its pension shareholders for funding in order to finance a proposed deal to buy out 7-Eleven owner Seven & i Holdings Co., people familiar with the Canadian retailer’s thinking said.】

item.title: 淡水河谷任命古斯塔沃-皮门塔（Gustavo Pimenta）为下一任首席执行官，结束混乱的继任局面
item.description: 巴西矿业巨头淡水河谷公司（Vale SA）董事会一致投票选出古斯塔沃-皮门塔（Gustavo Pimenta）为下一任首席执行官，接替爱德华多-巴托洛梅奥（Eduardo Bartolomeo）成为该公司的最高领导人，从而结束了混乱的继任过程。【原文：Vale SA has picked Gustavo Pimenta as its next chief executive officer to replace Eduardo Bartolomeo as top boss of the Brazilian mining giant in a unanimous vote by the board, bringing an end to a messy succession process.】
